casebody.data:
Ocean HILL
v.
CURRITUCK BOARD OF COMM. No. 382P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 29, 2006. John R. Wester, Jonathan C. Krisko, Charlotte, Thomas P. Nash, IV, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill I Prop. Owners Asso. Katherine F. McKenzie, Raleigh, for Currituck County Bd. of Comm. C. Everett Thompson, II, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill Joint Venture et al. Paul A. Meyer, Assistant General Counsel, for NC Asso. of County Commissioners. Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Senior Assistant General Counsel, for NC League of Municipalities.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2006 by NC League of Municipalities for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of August 2006."
